title: Corrigan Texas Police - Arrest of Battousai by Officer Fitzpatrick Foster and Officer Tracy Brown - Officer Albert Richard's Employee File

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) A copy of any and all documents, files, photographs in the Employee File of: Officer Albert Richard.

2) A copy of any and all complaint(s) received for the following officer: Officer Albert Richard.

3) A copy of any and all Internal Affairs Report(s) and or Finding(s) for the following officer: Officer Albert Richard.

4) A copy of any and all Disciplinary Record(s) for the following officer: Officer Albert Richard.

5) A copy of any termination paperwork, or letter of resignation from the following officer: Officer Albert Richard.

Excluded from this request:

a) Confidential information deemed protected by Texas Law, Statute or Attorney General Ruling.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Stuart Martin
